move.name: Move Command (M)
move.info: Moves a unit to specified location without attacking units in the path

attackMove.name: Attack Move Command (A)
attackMove.info: Moves to a specified location and attacks units that are in the path

hold.name: Hold Command (H)
hold.info: Unit is unable to move but is able to attack units in reach

towerSpawnI.name: Tower Spawn I
towerSpawnI.tip: Spawn an uncontrolled ghostly unit from the center tower for no cost or population.

towerSpawnII.name: Tower Spawn II
towerSpawnII.tip: Spawn a more powerfull uncontrolled ghostly unit from the center tower for no cost or population.

minerTower.name: Miner Tower Upgrade
minerTower.tip: Allows miner to construct a static tower that automatically attacks the enemy.

passiveIncomeGold1.name: Passive Income Gold I
passiveIncomeGold1.tip: Passively gain a small amount of gold and mana every few seconds.

passiveIncomeGold2.name: Passive Income Gold II
passiveIncomeGold2.tip: Passively gain a small amount of gold and mana every few seconds.

passiveIncomeGold3.name: Passive Income Gold III
passiveIncomeGold3.tip: Passively gain a small amount of gold and mana every few seconds, increasing the amount gained with each level up to a maximum of 3 levels.

wingidonSpeed.name: Wingidon Haste
wingidonSpeed.tip: Using this spell will make Eclipsors fly faster for a short period of time, at the cost of not being able to shoot.

dartSpray.name: Dart Spray
dartSpray.tip: using this spell will make the turret spawn a Circle of darts doing massive damage to enemys.

towerExplotion.name: Tower Explotion
towerExplotion.tip: After a unit destroyes a Tower it will trigger an explotion, doing small dmg and fire dmg.

deadPoison.name: Poison Guts
deadPoison.tip: Deads can toggle on and off the ability to have their projectiles inflict poison.

catPack.name: Pack Mentality
catPack.tip: Increasing the amount of Crawlers in your army will increase the damage of all Crawlers.

giantSize1.name: Giant Growth I
giantSize1.tip: Your Giants will increase in size and health.

giantSize2.name: Giant Growth II
giantSize2.tip: Your Giants will increase in size and health dramatically.

giantSize3.name: Giant Growth III
giantSize3.tip: Your Giants will become kind of invincible(Ase's Son tools only).

castleArchers1.name: Castle Dead I
castleArchers1.tip: An untargetable powerful Dead will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers2.name: Castle Dead level II
castleArchers2.tip: A 2nd untargetable powerful Dead will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers3.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers3.tip: A 3rd untargetable powerful Dead will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers4.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers4.tip: Defensive castle archer that outranges all units

castleArchers5.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers5.tip: Defensive castle archer that outranges all units

medusaPoison.name: Venom Flux
medusaPoison.tip: Medusa and head of snakes spit a grotesk pool of poison on the ground.

knightCharge.name: Charge
knightCharge.tip: Jugger Knight will charge forward smashing into units.

skeletonFistAttack.name: Hell Fists
skeletonFistAttack.tip: A powerful line of fists will smash up from the ground causing instant damage to anything in its path.

catSpeed.name: Predatory Edge
catSpeed.tip: Massive run speed increase for Crawlers.

tower.name: Construct Tower
tower.info: Instructs miner to build a static tower to defend a position.

bomber.name: Bomber
bomber.info: Single use bomber unit. Explodes with area of effect damage. Best used against multiple oponents.
bomber.saying: Medusa wants you to have this!

cat.name: Crawler
cat.info: Quick unit that gains an attack advantage when fighting in a pack.

pack.name: Pack Mentality
pack.info: As more crawlers enter the battlefield each crawlers damage output is increased. Stacks up to 5 times.

knight.name: Jugger Knight
knight.info: Solid melee unit that is able to initiate battle with a devastating charge.

charge.name: Charge
charge.info: Causes the unit to charge in a straight line straight up the battlefield. Stuns the first unit that is hit by this charge.

skelator.name: Marrowkai
skelator.info: Powerful mage that is able to fear units into combat and damage units in a line.
skelator.saying: I am all that is left.

fist.name: Undead Fists
fist.info: Summons undead fists from the grave to damage units in a line.

reaper.name: Reaper
reaper.info: Reaps an enemy unit into moving towards your army.

medusa.name: Medusa
medusa.saying: You fools thought Inamorta belonged to you?

stone.name: Stone Face
stone.info: Stones the opponent instantly killing any non giant unit.

poison.name: Poison Spray
poison.info: Sprays a poison over the ground.

giant.name: Giant
giant.info: Clobbers the opponent causing area of effect damage.

wingidonSpeed.name: Wingidon Haste
wingidonSpeed.info: Burst of accelerated wing movement at the cost of being able to shoot.

dead.name: Dead
dead.info: A zombie that uses pieces of its own body as projectiles.

poison.name: Poisoned Guts
poison.info: A toggle that activates poison mode.

tower.name: Tower
tower.info: A tower that fires missiles at the enemy.

dartSpray.name: Dart Spray
dartSpray.info: The tower will spray Darts in a circle doing massive dmg to the enemy.

passiveIncomeGold1.name: Passive Income Gold 1
passiveIncomeGold1.tip: Passively gain a small amount of gold and mana every few seconds.

passiveIncomeGold2.name: Passive Income Gold 2
passiveIncomeGold2.tip: Passively gain a small amount of gold and mana every few seconds.

passiveIncomeGold3.name: Passive Income Gold 3
passiveIncomeGold3.tip: Passively gain a small amount of gold and mana every few seconds. Increasing the amount gained with each level up to a maximum of 3 levels

castleArchers1.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers1.tip: An untargetable powerful Archidon will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers2.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers2.tip: A second untargetable powerful Archidon will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers3.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers3.tip: A third untargetable powerful Archidon will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers4.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers4.tip: A 4th untargetable powerful Archidon will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers5.name: Castle Archer
castleArchers5.tip: Defensive castle archer that outranges all units

flyingCrossbowmanStun.name: Stun
flyingCrossbowmanStun.tip: Defensive castle archer that outranges all units

rage.name: Rage
rage.tip: Increased attack and movement speed for a short period of time. Upon activation the Swordwrath will lose a small portion of health.

block.name: Shield Wall
block.tip: Speartons will move into a defensive stance reducing incoming damage by 40%.

cloak.name: Shinobi Level I
cloak.tip: Cloak and the next attack out of Shinobi will do increased damage and inflict poison on the enemy.

cloak2.name: Cloak Level 2
cloak2.tip: Cloak and the next attack out of Shinobi will do massive increased damage and inflict poison on the enemy.

archidonFire.name: Fire Arrows
archidonFire.tip: Fire a single flaming arrow with extra range and damage.

cure.name: Cure
cure.tip: A spell to cure a single poisoned unit.

magikillWall.name: Magikill Wall
magikillWall.tip: The Magikill casts a wall of electricty that damages all enemy units that stand within it.

magikillPoison.name: Poison Spray
magikillPoison.tip: A directional spell that sprays multiple units infecting them with poison.

speartonShieldBash.name: Shield Bash
speartonShieldBash.tip: Speartons will smash back the enemy with their shields.

giantSize1.name: Giant Growth I
giantSize1.tip: Your Giants will increase in size and health.

giantSize2.name: Giant Growth II
giantSize2.tip: Your Giants will increase in size and health dramatically.

goldPassive1.name: Passive Income
goldPassive1.tip: Increases the amount of passive income.

minerWall.name: Miner Wall
minerWall.tip: Constructs a wall that blocks the enemy.

crossbowFire.name: Blazing Bolts
crossbowFire.tip: Allbowtross fire flaming bolts with increased damage.

swordwrath.name: Swordwrath
swordwrath.info: High damaging unit with low survivability.
swordwrath.saying: Limbs will sever at mere sight!

rage.name: Rage
rage.info: Increased attack and movement speed for a short period of time at the cost of a small portion of health.

spearton.name: Spearton
spearton.info: An armored unit used to tank damage, powerful when paired with ranged units.
spearton.saying: Born to die, But not before them!

shieldWall.name: Shield Wall
shieldWall.info: Toggles shield wall that reduces damage taken by 40% but removes ability to move.

shieldBash.name: Shield Bash
shieldBash.info: Speartons will smash back the enemy with their shields, stunning them.

ninja.name: Shadowrath
ninja.info: Fast assassins that are strong in direct combat, with potential to assassinate spellcasters through Shinobi.
ninja.saying: The last thing you never see.

fury.name: Fury
fury.info: Damage increases with successive hits on a single target. Stacks up to 5 times.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.info: The Shadowrath turns invisible, and untargettable by any enemy units. The next attack will do increased damage and inflict poison on the enemy.

magikill.name: Magikill
magikill.info: A spellcaster that is able to cast a variety of damage-dealing spells.

nuke.name: Explosion
nuke.info: Casts a small area of effect explosion .

electricWall.name: Electric Wall
electricWall.info: A line of electricty that damages all units across the field.

poisonSpray.name: Poison Spray
poisonSpray.info: A spray of poison damages all units in a line.

monk.name: Meric
monk.info: A support unit that is able to heal and cure your front line troops.
monk.saying: All is well, I cast a spell!

archer.name: Archidon
archer.info: Basic ranged infantry with low health, but strong in large numbers.
archer.saying: They will fall before they get a chance to stand.

fire.name: Fire Arrow
fire.info: Shoots a single fire arrow into the air with increased range and damage.

flyingCrossbowman.name: Albowtross
flyingCrossbowman.info: An armored flying ranged unit wielding a crossbow. Strong against armored enemies.

miner.name: Miner
miner.info: A hard working miner, essential for gaining gold and mana.

wall.name: Wall
wall.info: Instructs miner to build a wall.

remove.name: Destroy Wall
remove.info: Causes a wall to remove itself

giant.name: Enslaved Giant
giant.info: Captured from the depths of Chaos territory, the Enslaved Giant hurls large boulders at your enemy against it's will.

castleArchers1.name: Castle Element I
castleArchers1.tip: An untargetable powerful Air Elemental will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers2.name: Castle Element level II
castleArchers2.tip: A 2nd untargetable powerful Air Elemental will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

castleArchers3.name: Castle Element
castleArchers3.tip: A 3rd untargetable powerful Air Elemental will appear high on your castle walls out of reach from the enemy.

split1.name: Clone level 1
split1.tip: The unit V will gain the ability to create two clones upon command.

split2.name: Clone level 2
split2.tip: The unit V's clones will do increased damage.

lavaPool.name: Meteor strike
lavaPool.tip: Fire rain ability will include flaming meteors creating a pile of burning rocks causing burn damage.

tornado.name: Tornado
tornado.tip: Unlock the Cycloids ability to cast the Tornado spell.

waterHealUpgrade.name: Advanced Healing
waterHealUpgrade.tip: Increased the amount healed when using Sacrificial Mass Heal Ability.

airElement.name: Air Elemental
airElement.info: A flying range unit that casts a powerful bolt of lighting on a single target.
airElement.saying: I'm always calm before I storm.

waterElement.name: Water Elemental
waterElement.info: Quick support unit with mass heal and cure upon death. Also has ability to freeze an enemy into a block of ice.
waterElement.saying: I am life you are death.

heal.name: Sacrificial Mass Heal
heal.info: This unit will sacrifice itself creating a explosion of healing and curing power healing all nearby friendly units.

earthElement.name: Earth Elemental
earthElement.info: A cheap basic ground unit with a stun attack. It can also transform into a miner.
earthElement.saying: We will, we will, punch you!

fireElement.name: Fire Elemental
fireElement.info: A ranged ground unit that throws a ball of fire. This unit can kite and its projectile causes burn damage.
fireElement.saying: Everything burns if its hot enough.

scorpionElement.name: Scorpling
scorpionElement.info: A unit spawned from the mouth of the Treature. This fast weak unit has the ability to poison with its attack if upgraded.

treeElement.name: Treature
treeElement.info: A massive slow moving caster that can spawn Scorplings and suck life from its enemies.
treeElement.saying: Say hello to my little friends.

flower.name: Death Blossom
flower.info: Casts a row of dead flowers that chase the targeted enemy then stun them with a spike root stealing life and blossoming the dead flowers.

root.name: Summon Scorplings
root.info: The tree will root itself into the ground and summon Scorplings from its hollow.

hurricaneElement.name: Cycloid
hurricaneElement.info: A flying melee support caster with the ability to protect units and throw powerful stunning tornados.

hurricane.name: Tornado
hurricane.info: Summons a large tornado causing a path of destruction.

protect.name: Protect
protect.info: Casts a temporary shield on itself or a targeted friendly unit.

lavaElement.name: Charrog
lavaElement.info: Heavy armored ground infantry with the ability to burrow and burn.
lavaElement.saying: Soon your pain will be gone.

radiant.name: Radiant Heat
radiant.info: The Charrog will glow with heat causing burn damage to all nearby units.

burrow.name: Burrow
burrow.info: The Charrog will dig itself into the ground and can not be detected or damaged by the enemy.

unburrow.name: Unburrow
unburrow.info: The Charrog will shoot out from the ground then slam himself on down stunning and damaging nearby units.

chrome.name: V
chrome.info: A powerful caster and leader of Elementals. V can clone itself into 3, teleport and possess other units.
chrome.saying: I will be your God once again!

convert.name: Possess
convert.info: Target an enemy unit to control it for as long as you can maintain Possess mode.

split.name: Clone
split.info: Creates two identical looking V units which auto attack the enemy.

teleport.name: Flash
teleport.info: Instant teleportation to and through to the targeted location.

firestormElement.name: Infernos
firestormElement.info: A powerfull caster with the ability to summon the mighty dragon "Vastolis" and call down a rain of fire.
firestormElement.saying: Awaken Vastolis, it's time to feed!

firestorm.name: Dragon Call
firestorm.info: Summon the mighty dragon "Vastolis" from the depths to cause mass devastation to the enemy.

firebreath.name: Fire Rain
firebreath.info: Calls down a rain of fire to the selected location inflicting burn damage on the enemy. Upgradable to Meteor Strike for increased damage.

miner.name: Chompler
miner.info: A hard working miner that will eat gold and collect it in his back, as well as pray for mana at the statue. It can also attack with its sharp beak and claws.

fireWater.name: Scorch
fireWater.info: The most powerful known explosion that will cause mass knock back and burn damage.

sandstorm.name: Blind Gate
sandstorm.info: A temporary gate rises from the ground that the enemy cannot see past.
